doc:
Vance Colvig https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vance_Colvig 0 Vance DeBar Colvig Jr. (March 9, 1918 – March 4, 1991) was an American character actor. He was the first to portray Bozo the Clown on a Harmon-licensed television program and lent his voice to the Chopper bulldog character on The Yogi the Bear Show. In the 1980s, he made guest appearances in various television series and music videos. Vance_DeBar_Colvig_Jr. ( March_9_,_1918 – March_4_,_1991 ) was an_American_character_actor . He was the_first to_portray Bozo the_Clown on a_Harmon-licensed_television_program and lent his_voice to the_Chopper_bulldog_character on The_Yogi the_Bear_Show . In the_1980s , he made guest_appearances in various_television_series_and_music_videos .
